title: [Self-Directed] Web-Based Decision Support System for Selecting Educational Multimedia

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital device usage skills and foundational language learning knowledge
context.additional_context: A course strengthening learners' capacity to select educational multimedia for language learning in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners identify at least three multimedia elements suitable for language learning using a web-based decision-making system.
Learners select optimal learning materials by applying multimedia evaluation criteria (accessibility, effectiveness, cost-efficiency, etc.).
Learners judge the applicability of VR-based language learning tools in simulation environments with over 80% accuracy.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
